Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-positive bacteria
Literature.Author: Guzmán F, Marshall S, Ojeda C, Albericio F, Carvajal-Rondanelli P

Literature.Title: Inhibitory effect of short cationic homopeptides against Gram-negative bacteria
Literature.Author: Carvajal-Rondanelli P, Aróstica M, Marshall SH, Albericio F, Álvarez CA, Ojeda C, Aguilar LF, Guzmán F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(10-20% Inhibition=10µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(90-100% Inhibition=20µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(10-20% Inhibition=10µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(20-30% Inhibition=10µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(10-20% Inhibition=10µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(90-100% Inhibition=20µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(40-50% Inhibition=10µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(80-90% Inhibition=20µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(30-40% Inhibition=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(90-100% Inhibition=20µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(20-30% Inhibition=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=20µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(90-100% Inhibition=30µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(50-60% Inhibition=10µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ISP 72-01(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(20-30% Inhibition=10µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(30-40% Inhibition=10µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ISP 1833-99(90-100% Inhibition=20-30µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(0-10% Inhibition=10µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(30-40% Inhibition=20µM),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(60-70% Inhibition=30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(10-20% Inhibition=10µM)
